item.title: Computer Program
item.description: Program A Computer Program is a sequence of instructions in a programing language which can a computer system can execute or interpret. When we engineer/programmer/developer write any program in any programing language of our choice, we actually write in very human-readable language. This is called source code. We can understand whan source code is saying; but the computer only knows binary, & it can only execute programs which is in machine instructions (writter in binary).
